name: Free Trial
description:
You just installed SpiceeOS, the spiciest operating system ever made™. But you skimped and got the trial version, and it's chained your cursor to the corner of the screen! Is there a way to install the full version of the OS without having full control over the mouse? Only one way to find out.

Note: 16:9 aspect ratio is required for this game. It probably won't work properly otherwise.

Another note: there's a glitch at the end where the mouse can disappear. If this happens to you, you already saw all the content in the game. The only thing you're missing is the credits. Consider it a win 😉

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. Theme: "Joined Together."
